errors.needToInitializeWallet: Need to initialize a wallet first

errors.storageFull: Storage full - unable to save wallet. Check browser storage settings.
errors.enterSeedPhrase: Enter a seed phrase to import wallet
errors.fixInvalidWords: Please fix invalid words in your seed phrase

errors.invalidAmountFormat: Payment request has invalid amount format

errors.cannotDeleteActiveWallet: Cannot delete the currently active wallet
errors.unableToConnectElectrum: Unable to connect to Electrum server '{server}'

welcome.title: Welcome to Cashonize
welcome.description: An easy-to-use Bitcoin Cash wallet with a focus on CashTokens and BCH dApps.

create.title: Create new wallet
create.description: Get started with a fresh wallet in seconds
create.seedPhraseNote: A new seed phrase will be generated. Back it up to secure your wallet.

walletType.label: Wallet type:
walletType.hdDescription: Uses a new address for each transaction (BIP44). Better privacy and standard for most wallets.
walletType.singleDescription: Uses one fixed address for all transactions. Simpler but less private.

derivationPath.label: Derivation path:
derivationPath.note: Note: Only the first address from your seed phrase will be used. If you've used this seed with other wallets, funds on other addresses won't appear.

preferences.title: Set up your preferences
preferences.description: Almost done! Configure your preferences below.
preferences.confirmPaymentsHint: Ask for confirmation after clicking send (recommended)

wallet.notEnoughBch: Not enough BCH in wallet to send

errors.tokenPaymentRequest: This is a token payment request. Use the Tokens tab to send tokens.
errors.noBalance: Wallet doesn't hold any Bitcoin Cash
errors.notCashaddress: Not a cashaddress on current network

batchTransfer.titleAll: Send all {count} NFTs of this category to

burn.description: Burning tokens removes them from the supply forever
burn.burnMintingDescription: Burn this NFT so no new NFTs of this category can be minted
burn.burnNftDescription: Burning this NFT to remove it from your wallet forever

authTransfer.description: Transfer the authority to change the token's metadata
authTransfer.descriptionNft: Transfer the authority to change the token's metadata to another wallet
authTransfer.dedicatedWalletNote: You can either transfer the Auth to a dedicated wallet or to the {link}.
authTransfer.reservedSupplyNote: Token supply kept at the Auth UTXO will be marked as reserved supply, not yet in circulation.

mint.title: Mint a number of (unique) NFTs to a specific address
mint.uniqueCheckbox: make each NFT unique by numbering each one in the collection

authWarning.title: Auth Warning
authWarning.message:
You risk unintentionally sending the authority to update this token's metadata elsewhere.
Are you sure you want to send the transaction anyways?

burnTokens.title: Burn Tokens
burnTokens.message:
You are about to burn {amount} {symbol}, this cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to burn the tokens?

burnNft.title: Burn NFT
burnNft.message:
You are about to burn {nftType}, this cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to burn the NFT?

alerts.sentTokensNoSymbol: Sent {amount} fungible tokens of category {tokenId} to {address}
alerts.sentAllNfts: Sent all NFTs of category {tokenId} to {address}
alerts.transferredAuth: Transferred the Auth of utxo {tokenId} to {address}

errors.needBchForFee: Need some BCH to cover transaction fee
errors.notTokenAddress: Not a Token Address (should start with z...)
errors.noDecimalsAllowed: This token does not allow for decimal places
errors.maxDecimalsAllowed: This token only allows up to {decimals} decimal places
errors.differentTokenRequest: This payment request is for a different token
errors.amountMustBeInteger: Amount tokens to burn must be a valid integer
errors.reservedSupplyInvalid: Amount tokens for reserved supply must be a valid integer
errors.notCashaddress: Not a cashaddress on current network

dapp.title: Connect to Dapp
dapp.exploreText: See {link} to explore the full list of BCH Dapps with WalletConnect

errors.notValidUri: Not a valid WalletConnect or CashConnect URI

seedPhrase.title: Wallet seed phrase
seedPhrase.copyMessage:
Copying your seed phrase to the clipboard is not recommended for security reasons, but allowed for convenience.
You can clear your clipboard afterwards by copying something else.

verification.title: Backup verification test
verification.subtitle: Enter the following words from your written backup to confirm you've saved it correctly.
verification.failureNotification: Some words don't match. Please check and try again.

persistentStorage.grantedHint: — this protects wallet data from being cleared
persistentStorage.deniedHint: — request data persistence from the browser
persistentStorage.hint: In rare cases, browsers may clear site data automatically. To protect against this, we are requesting data persistence.
persistentStorage.grantedNotification: Persistent storage granted - your wallet data is protected
persistentStorage.deniedNotification: Persistent storage denied - make sure you have a backup of your seed phrase

createNew.hint: A new seed phrase will be generated. Back it up to secure your wallet.

importExisting.hint: Or restore a wallet using your existing seed phrase.

derivationPath.label: Derivation path:
derivationPath.note: Note: Only the first address from your seed phrase will be used. If you've used this seed with other wallets, funds on other addresses won't appear.

walletsOverview.walletLimitReached: Number of wallets limited to {max} for now

deleteWallet.title: Delete Wallet
deleteWallet.message:
Are you sure you want to delete the wallet "{name}"?
This action cannot be undone.
deleteWallet.cannotDeleteActive: Cannot delete the currently active wallet

createTokens.title: Create new tokens
createTokens.intro: You can use the {link} for the easiest token creation, or you can use the built-in process below for fine-grained control.
createTokens.needBch: Need BCH in wallet to create tokens
createTokens.noUtxos: Currently the wallet does not have any UTXOs capable of token creation.
createTokens.fungibleDescription: Fungible Tokens is used to create interchangeable tokens. The total supply of fungible tokens needs to be determined at creation.
createTokens.mintingDescription: Minting NFT is used to create an NFT collection. The minting NFT has the ability to mint new NFTs with the same tokenId.
createTokens.mintingNote: Note: to use a Minting NFT toggle the option "Enable mint NFTs" in the developer settings.
createTokens.supplyLabel: Choose the total supply of fungible tokens
createTokens.supplyNote: note: add extra zeroes for the number of decimals set in the BCMR metadata
createTokens.metadataIntro: To add metadata to your token you need to upload the token image(s), create a JSON file following the {link}, upload it somewhere and then post that link on-chain.
createTokens.selectUploadLocation: Select where to upload your metadata (IPFS recommended):
createTokens.metadataNote: Note: Token metadata can still be added/updated after creation with the token's AuthUTXO. To use this functionality toggle "Enable authchain resolution" in the developer settings. Transfer the AuthUTXO to a dedicated wallet right after creation.

notifications.urlPrefixError: Urls should not have any prefix!
notifications.ipfsCidError: Ipfs location should be a v1 CID

consolidate.title: Consolidate BCH UTXOs
consolidate.description: Combine all BCH-only UTXOs into a single UTXO. If a dApp asks you to "consolidate your funds" even though you have enough balance, it means you have too many small UTXOs.
consolidate.alreadyConsolidated: Your wallet already has {status} BCH-only UTXO.

combined.title: Combined BCH + Token UTXOs
combined.description: Some dApps return UTXOs that combine BCH with tokens, causing the BCH to not show in your balance.
combined.warningCount: {count} UTXO with combined BCH + Tokens | {count} UTXOs with combined BCH + Tokens
combined.splittableAmount: You have {bch} BCH that can be split from token UTXOs.
combined.nftNote: Note: This tool can only split BCH from fungible token UTXOs, not NFTs.

notifications.splitSuccess: Split BCH from Token UTXO successfully!

sweepPrivateKey.title: Sweep Private Key
sweepPrivateKey.description: Sweep BCH from a private key WIF:

notifications.noWifProvided: No private key WIF provided to sweep
notifications.success: Successfully swept funds on Private Key

qrErrors.notWif: Not a QR code encoding a Private Key in WIF format
qrErrors.notMainnetWif: Not a QR code encoding a Mainnet Private Key in WIF format
qrErrors.notChipnetWif: Not a QR code encoding a Chipnet Private Key in WIF format

errors.permissionRequired: Permission required to access the camera
errors.noCamera: No camera found on this device
errors.nonSecureContext: Unable to acccess camera in non-secure context
errors.constraintsMismatch: Constraints don't match any installed camera. Did you ask for the front camera although there is none?

sessionProposal.title: Approve Session?
sessionProposal.willSeeTokens: Will be able to see Tokens:
sessionProposal.willInvokeMethods: Will be able to invoke Methods/Events:

notifications.networkMismatch: This Dapp requires wallet to be on {network}. Please navigate to settings and change network to use this Dapp.

transactionRequest.title: Sign Transaction
transactionRequest.unverifiedTokenNote: {count, plural, one {Token} other {Tokens}} not in your wallet. New metadata fetched for preview.
transactionRequest.unverifiedTokenNoteSingular: Token not in your wallet. New metadata fetched for preview.
transactionRequest.unverifiedTokenNotePlural: Tokens not in your wallet. New metadata fetched for preview.

errors.notInitialized: WalletConnect not initialized yet. Please try again in a moment.
errors.invalidUri: Not a valid BCH WalletConnect URI
errors.unsupportedBlockchain: Trying to connect an app from unsupported blockchain(s): {chains}
errors.invalidTransactionSchema: Error in validating schema of WalletConnect transaction request
errors.invalidSignMessageSchema: Error in validating schema of WalletConnect sign message request
errors.transactionFailedToSend: Transaction failed to send with error: {error}

userOptions.confirmPaymentsHint: Ask for confirmation after clicking send (recommended)
userOptions.showCauldronFTValue: Show fiat value for fungible tokens
userOptions.showCauldronFTValueHint: Display fiat value for fungible tokens with at least 1 BCH liquidity on Cauldron DEX

advanced.electrumSelfSignedBrowser: Using self-signed certs? {link} to accept the certificate first.
advanced.electrumSelfSignedApp: Note: self-signed certs are not currently supported in the app.
advanced.exchangeRateDefault: Default (bitcoin.com for USD, BitPay for rest)
advanced.deleteAllWallets: Remove all wallets and all data from {platform}
advanced.deleteAllWalletsConfirm:
You are about to delete all Cashonize wallets and data from this {platform}.
Are you sure you want to delete everything?
advanced.deleteAllWalletsPwaWarning:
You are about to delete all Cashonize wallets and data from this {platform}.
This will also delete them from your browser!
Are you sure you want to delete everything?
advanced.pwaDeleteWarning: Deleting all wallets from the 'Installed web-app' will also delete them from your browser!
advanced.browserDeleteWarning: Deleting all wallets from the browser will also remove them from any 'Installed web-app'.

developer.enableMintNftsHint: Adds a mint action to minting NFTs, allowing you to create more NFTs in the same category
developer.enableAuthchainsHint: Checks if you hold the AuthHead (authority to update token metadata) and enables transferring it
developer.disableTokenIconsHint: Prevents loading token images from external servers
